thread.title: Marius Cardel

author: Marius Cardel
title: Marius Cardel
text: I paid the Â£35 extra for a full cover insurance but t the desk , after waiting for 45 minutes , (because the staff was busy with smoking or eating or sorting the sentimental problem over the phone),I managed to get to speak to a guy who told me that ''what you already pay for whatever insurance is rubbish for us, I don't know what kind of insurance you paid, but that is nothing for us, therefore you have to put 1700euro as a deposit '' , so, as I said IT WILL BE NO NEXT TIME FOR ME WITH klass wagen .
